body: Hi Again. I answer your questions one by one and also post the images that you sent for other users reference. If you can post your question in a similar manner that would be really helpful. Don't be shy to open up multiple discussions: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/4hNukqhfhE3n4YZqSB-bUG1bLGmsURN3fRppAF5GfsvUnGAVRFoXbx3nnJ0FQ9DM79RiBceWFvkoGZ0axRsvp41Xd2Dvci-m/question1.png) 1.1 The confusion comes from the fact that they are separated from each other. In step 7 you are reading the results form the folder. Step 6 is for running the analysis. In step 7 you make the decision about which part of the result do you want to read from. If you get the results from runDaylightAnalysis component then the results will match to your sliders in number 6.
